HiddenText.Name: What if I still haven’t had contact with my Pathway student?
HiddenText.OpenningText: What if I still haven’t had contact with my Pathway student?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Send an email to the Pathway student requesting to meet. If the student has more than one email address, be sure to send the email to both addresses. If the Pathway student still hasn’t made contact after this, email the Speaking Partner managers and explain what has happened.
